languages.text: Кто бы ни руководил планетой официально — теперь от него не осталось даже материалов для сервочерепа.
Whoever was the planet's official ruler has been reduced to less than servo-skull material.
languages.original_text: Кто бы ни руководил планетой официально — теперь от него не осталось даже материалов для сервочерепа.

traits.locale_text: Whoever was the planet's official ruler has been reduced to less than even servo-skull material.
Whoever was the planet's official ruler has been reduced to less than even servo-skull material.
Whoever was the planet's official ruler has been reduced to less than servo-skull material.
Whoever was the planet's official ruler has been reduced to less than servo-skull material.
Whoever was the planet's official ruler has been reduced to less than servo-skull material.
Whoever was the planet's official ruler has been reduced to less than servo-skull material.

languages.text: Wer auch immer der offizielle Herrscher über diesen Planeten war, wurde zu weniger als Servoschädel-Material reduziert.
languages.original_text: Whoever was the planet's official ruler has been reduced to less than servo-skull material.

traits.locale_text: Wer auch immer der offizielle Herrscher über diesen Planeten war, wurde zu weniger als Servoschädel-Material reduziert.

languages.text: Le dirigeant de la planète, quelle qu'est pu être son identité, est instantanément pulvérisé par le tir.
languages.original_text: Whoever was the planet's official ruler has been reduced to less than servo-skull material.

traits.locale_text: Le dirigeant de la planète, quelle qu'est pu être son identité, est instantanément pulvérisé par le tir.

languages.text: この惑星の正式な支配者だった者は、今やサーヴォスカルの素材にもならないほどに落ちぶれた。
languages.original_text: Whoever was the planet's official ruler has been reduced to less than servo-skull material.

traits.locale_text: この惑星の正式な支配者だった者は、今やサーヴォスカルの素材にもならないほどに落ちぶれた。

languages.text: Fuese quien fuese el gobernante oficial del planeta, ahora no serviría ni como servocráneo.
languages.original_text: Whoever was the planet's official ruler has been reduced to less than servo-skull material.

traits.locale_text: Fuese quien fuese el gobernante oficial del planeta, ahora no serviría ni como servocráneo.

languages.text: 虽然你不清楚这颗行星的统治者是谁，但如今，他已经彻底灰飞烟灭，连伺服头骨都做不了了。
languages.original_text: Whoever was the planet's official ruler has been reduced to less than servo-skull material.

traits.locale_text: 虽然你不清楚这颗行星的统治者是谁，但如今，他已经彻底灰飞烟灭，连伺服头骨都做不了了。

languages.text: Gezegenin resmî hükümdarı her kimse anında hizmelet parçacıklarına ayrılıyor.
languages.original_text: Whoever was the planet's official ruler has been reduced to less than servo-skull material.

traits.locale_text: Gezegenin resmî hükümdarı her kimse, anında hizmelet parçacıklarına ayrılıyor.
